review: "Charlotte" is a captivating start to the series, blending elements of supernatural abilities and school life seamlessly. The characters are intriguing, with a blend of depth and charm that makes it hard not to want to see more of their story. While the plot moves at a brisk pace, there's room for more emotional development, especially in the relationships between the main characters. Overall, a solid and enjoyable read that fans of manga and supernatural stories will appreciate.
